titles.title: Rural Communities Hospice Care Access Improvement Act of 2003

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove the 20 percent inpatient limitation under the medicare program on the proportion of hospice care that certain rural hospice programs may provide.
Rural Communities Hospice Care Access Improvement Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Rural Communities Hospice Care Access Improvement Act of 2003 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to create an exception to the Medicare 20 percent inpatient care limitation for certain rural hospice programs with 20 beds or fewer.
